title: Split IE into two versions: Normal and Developer mode
body:
You should split IE into two different browsers/executables:
One default for normal user where devtools is not available(which may result in better performance?)
One for developers where the tools are available and where the browser GUI itself can include debugging tools shortcuts etc.

comments.body: FYI, the developer toolbar is just BHO that won't be loaded if you disable it. So maybe what you're asking is to make "disable" as default option for this plugin.
